subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd had a huge body of work to draw on as a new addition to the Knicks last season, but he has nothing but his assistants’ advice to fall back on as the Nets’ rookie coach.
snippet: Jason Kidd had a huge body of work to draw on as a new addition to the Knicks last season, but he has nothing but his assistants’ advice to fall back on as the Nets’ rookie coach.
